results.content: Fantastic course and tips on how to get a Web Developer Job! I've been seeking something like this for a very long time. 5 stars to this course!
results.content_html: Fantastic course and tips on how to get a Web Developer Job! I've been seeking something like this for a very long time. 5 stars to this course!

results.content: Great Job!!! Outstanding!!!! All the good stuff is near the end. First part was good too, but the ending is the "grabber".
results.content_html: Great Job!!! Outstanding!!!! All the good stuff is near the end. First part was good too, but the ending is the "grabber".

results.content: Good pace of the course, Adria makes a great job to explain everything he knows and all his experience and tricks to get a fast way to companies and to improve your professional CVs and online appearance. At the end of the course, there is a live interview with a woman working in human resources. That really helps, thanks

results.content: Good information. Instructor is knowledgeable and enthusiastic. Provides good resources and examples.
